title: Stage Lv5-A2-S05
description: Level 5 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: I is likely to first present an overview of today's presentation. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to explain the research findings in three parts. (academic variant 1)
learning_points: Level 5 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: I is likely to first present an overview of today's presentation. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 연구 결과를 세 부분으로 나누어 설명하겠습니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: I is likely to explain the research findings in three parts. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to interpret the phenomenon through a theoretical framework. (academic variant 1)

sentences.kr: 학술적 논의를 위한 기초를 마련하고자 합니다. (학술 1)
sentences.en: I aim to establish a foundation for academic discussion. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to explain complex concepts step by step. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to explore the implications of the research in depth. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to discuss the methodological approach in detail. (academic variant 1)
We is likely to deepen understanding through questions and discussion. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to approach the problem from an interdisciplinary perspective. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to present research limitations and future directions. (academic variant 1)
I is likely to first present an overview of today's presentation. (academic variant 2)
